description: Fixed checkbox column width in ActionsNew to match Contacts
changes: âœ… Fixed checkbox column width - constrained to w-10 (40px)
Problem: Checkbox column was expanding because data columns had explicit widths but checkbox didn't
Solution: Added w-10 class to both checkbox th (header) and td (body)
Now matches Interview System Contacts page table layout EXACTLY
Users must HARD REFRESH (Cmd+Shift+R) to see the fix!
